attributes.action: introduce gay marriage to the UK giving homosexuals exactly the same rights as heterosexuals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introducing Gay Marriage to the UK so that homosexual people can have the traditional marriage if they wish to wherever they want to. They may choose to marry in a church and this should be allowed. This gives them the same rights as heterosexual people. In the 21st Century equal rights are essential.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
